alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 8:37PM CDT until August 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rooks County in north central Kansas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 837 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bogue, or 8 miles east of Hill City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Damar around 845 PM CDT. Palco around 850 PM CDT. Webster State Park around 855 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Zurich, Plainville and Codell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
